name: ddr-calc
description: Calculator with DDR speed-modifier specific functionality; fast and offline PWA

scripts.copy: mkdir -p build/img && cp -R src/*.* src/.well-known src/.htaccess src/_headers build/ && cp src/img/*.png build/img/ && cp src/games.json build/games.v$npm_package_version.json
scripts.merge-svg: echo '<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">' > build/img/icons.v$npm_package_version.svg && sed -e 's/<\/svg>//' -e 's/<svg[^>]*>//' src/img/*.svg >> build/img/icons.v$npm_package_version.svg && echo '</svg>' >> build/img/icons.v$npm_package_version.svg
scripts.prebuild: yarn run clean && yarn run copy && yarn run merge-svg
scripts.minify: yarn run minify:fe && yarn run minify:sw
scripts.build: yarn run minify && yarn run replace
